transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji, [unintelligible] namaskar.
Customer: Namaskar. Hello.
Executive: Haan ji, sir bataiye.
Customer: Sir, mera ye kuch product product the mere yaha pe item isme.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To proper unka wo listing nahi ho rahi shayad.
Executive: Products se aapko listing ho rahi hai. Bataye sir, kaun sa product aapka? Garden mein bana raha hu sir. Main bata raha hu. Yaha mera particular product hai fountain. Ye mera garden fountain karke pada hua hai. Isko 25% show ho raha hai sir.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Aur sir isko 25% ki baat kar rahe hai aap?
Executive: Haan sir, haan sir, haan sir.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha, theek hai, theek hai. Aur bataye sir.
Customer: Sir, main ek request aur kar raha tha sir ki aaj kal jo hai calling ka thoda kam aa raha hai. Kya chakkar hai? Call kyu kam aa rahe hai sir? Kya reason hai sir? Kaha kya galti ho rahi hai humse?
Executive: Calls aapko kam aa rahe hai. Last time sir aapka call ka ratio aapka kam hua hai sir.
Customer: To haan sir wo abhi do teen din pehle aaya ek do teen call usse pehle to aa hi nahi rahe the samjho is mahine se lagbhag.
Executive: Sir aapko average main aapko bata de raha hu sir calls. Hmm hmm.
Executive: Nahi sir call to mujhe lagta hai theek aa rahi hai. 17 call, 18 call, 19 call ka average aa raha hai sir aapko. Haan thoda sa down hua hai sir idhar August ke baad se.
Customer: Haan haan. August ke baad se August se pehle aapko teen call, 28 call, 30 call ka average sir apna. 35-35 call bhi aayi hai kisi kisi mahine aapko. To market ka overall sir hoga. Ho sakta hai competition thoda sa upar niche hua ho. Ya fir sir aisa bhi ho sakta hai ki wo to hota hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Hai na? Ki jaise maan lo sir aaj ke ek saal pehle ya do saal pehle aap IndiaMART pe kaha the sir? Aaj ki date pe aap kya chala rahe ho sir usme? Wo usse bhi depend karta hai sir. Aur baki sir kuch changes bhi hai jaise aap keh rahe ho ki aapka wo catalog score 25 bata rahe ho sir aap, right?
Customer: Sahi baat hai.
Executive: Haan to shayad wo main ek bar aapke jo account manager hai, Miss Deepanshi, right?
Customer: Haan main Deepanshi ji aapke baat kar raha hu.
Executive: Yes yes. Hmm hmm.
Executive: To abhi badha inhone? Kabhi kabhi rehti hai sir.
Customer: Ji ji sir.
Executive: Abhi last time to unka sir aapke sath meeting hua hai.
Customer: Repeat kare na sir thoda voice crack ho gaya aapka.
Executive: Aaj hi sir aapki unki meeting hui hai aaj ki date mein.
Customer: Haan. Haan haan ek call mere paas aaya tha us time kya tha ki main jara meeting mein tha. To maine apne jo bhi mere maine call wala attend karne ke liye employee ko rakha hai unko maine attend kar diya tha un logo se bol diya tha. But pata nahi kya kaise hua but wo product abhi tak pure correct nahi ho paye.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Mujhe lagta hai I think mere wajah se mera utna matlab rate weight dene ka jaruri tha isliye nahi ho paya shayad wo. To jaise hi main free hua maine back call kiya unko. Mujhe pata hai kya hai na jo bhi product aap IndiaMART pe dalte ho maan lo sir aapke paas abhi current mein aapne jo products dale hue hai total hai 110. Theek?
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: 110 mein sir har product ka score in general sir 70 ke upar hona chahiye. 70-70 ke 80 ke. Yes yes yes yes yes. Uske aapke unique photos plus price plus uske specifications ya fir jo bhi aapka description hai. Ye sara kuch field hai. To ab employee jo hamara IndiaMART pe hota hai sir wo aapka image maan lo agar maine bol diya sir apne side se laga do to wo try karega ki bahar se laga dega. Aur sir bahar se Google se kuch image hoga na aur aapka unique product lagana wo difference aa jata hai sir aap samjho sir.
Executive: Yes yes.
Customer: Sir sir. Hmm.
Customer: To hum chahte hai sir aapse ek help chahta hu. Hmm hmm.
Executive: Bataye sir.
Customer: Mera ek kya hai inse pehle mere jo hai Sparshi Verma karke ek manager the account manager. Haan ji. Unka bahut achche chalta tha. Unko kya kya rehta tha wo apne aap hi matlab koi mera product samajh gaye the wo kya hai kaise hai. To wo apne aap hi upload kar dete the. Mujhe kabhi aisa nahi laga ki samne se call karna pada. Agar kabhi kuch incorrect hua to unhone phone kar liya samne se ki bhai aapka ye incorrect hai. Inka bhi theek hai ye bhi kar lete hai magar aapke field mein kya hota hai har kisi ko field ki knowledge nahi hoti hai sir. Hai na? Ab ye meri jo category hai inko itni knowledge nahi hai to shayad mere behalf pe wo nahi kar pa rahi hai. Matlab mere ko time nahi mil pata. Meri galti keh lo unki thodi yu kahenge.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: So kya wo Sparshi Verma abhi aapke yaha pe hai?
Executive: Sparshi Verma to nahi sir. Kyuki aapko wo dekh rahi hai. Garima Singh aapko dekh rahi thi sir. Unse pehle kaun dekh raha tha? Garima Singh unse pehle account manager kaun tha mera Garima Singh se?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Sir wo to bahut pehle ki baat kar rahe honge fir to aap sir. Bataye bataye. Yani ki aap kariban 2025 se leke abhi tak to ratio hi Garima Singh hi dekh rahi hai sir.
Customer: Okay unse unse pehle kaun dekh raha tha? 2025 mein 24 se main 23 ki baat kar raha hu 24 23 bataye aap.
Executive: Garima Singh hi dekh rahi hai sir.
Customer: Kya baat kar rahe hai? Account manager Sparshi Verma hai mere. Sparshi Verma aapke account manager hai?
Executive: Nahi nahi sir is time kabhi bhi account manager aapka Deepanshi dikha raha hai.
Customer: Are main bata raha hu sir suno suno. Kya hai jo aapki Garima hai wo account manager to hai nahi. Sparshi Verma aapka 2024 mein Jain mein thi wo.
Executive: Haan. Bilkul sir. Wo Jain mein thi aapke manager. Theek hai.
Customer: Haan haan. To unki baat kar raha hu. Abhi wo kya hai ke hat gayi hai?
Executive: Unka kya record hai? Status kya hai unki job ka abhi?
Customer: Bilkul hongi sir running mein hongi wo dekhna padega. Ab course hongi. To mere ko arrange karwa do na unko jo baat hai mere is account se add ho jaye to. Haan ji?
Customer: Dekho sir mera simple hai aapke account se unko Deepanshi jo aapka kaam kar rahi hai theek hai wahi kaam Sparshi Verma bhi karti hai. Mera IndiaMART ko aap represent kar rahe ho overall sir. Aapki servicing ka issue jo hota hai wo hume resolve karke denge. Yani ki IndiaMART resolve karti hai. Ab wo chahe Deepanshi kare, main karu, Sparshi kare ya koi bhi kare.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Koi baat nahi. Main simple aata hu aapke product pe. Mera naam Suraj hai sir.
Executive: Main aapse naam puch raha hu kya hai?
Customer: Suraj Suraj kya naam bataya sir aapne? Suraj Maurya. Suraj ji Suraj ji Suraj Maurya. Sir Suraj Suraj sir kya hai kya hai aap Maurya hai. To main isme nahi ja raha ki aap kya aage chalte hai usse mujhe matlab nahi mujhe matlab hai Suraj sir hai aur Suraj sir ko ye pata hai ki ped paudhe kaise kis type ke attractive lagte hai kya hai. To aap maine bola sir wo aap product. Kya hai wo pedo ke matlab paudho ke aap hi dal do. Main main itna time nahi deta sir mera kya government sector mein nahi deta itna road ki ab ek ek ped ke liye main search karta rahu usme. Maine bol diya Suraj sir dal dena aap apne hisab se score badh jaye apna seedha simple. To Suraj sir ne utha ke dal diya. Ab iske liye kya hota hai kabhi kabhi thoda apne ko bhi lagana padta hai na sir. Ab aap aap socho ki matlab main ek ped search karke main bheju photo main har cheez ke liye nahi karu to mere itna time nahi hai sir sirf aapke agar aapko koi baat hai sir to wo bol dunga Deepanshi se wo update kar degi jab jis product mein aapko karwana hai. Nahi nahi unka are wo unke.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Wo apni jagah sahi hai. Hmm hmm.
Customer: Kya possible hai change hona? Main ye puch raha hu kya Sparshi Verma aapki team mein possible hai? Kyuki bahut pehle thi Sparshi Verma aapke do saal pehle ki aap baat bata rahe hai. 2024 ke start mein yani ki 2023 wagera mein thi. Aur aap chala rahe ho sir kariban IndiaMART ka services wale mein Deepanshi bhi aapko aaj se nahi sir kaafi time se handle kar rahi hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Right? Nahi abhi ek saal nahi nahi hua hoga inko to. Kuch mahine hue honge. Haan haan last kariban kariban sir ye bhi panch che mahine se to aapko dekhe rahi hai Deepanshi. Maine bhi change karaya hai. Maine bhi change karaya tha inka. Maine bhi change karaya sir. Hmm hmm usse pehle Garima thi aapne Garima change karaya sir. Right? Haan haan haan. To karaya na? Garima aapke change ho gayi sir. Haan to sir jaise aapke paas multiple aapke account manager change hue hai. Abhi Deepanshi handle kar rahi hai aur Deepanshi ke main manager baat kar raha hu. Right?
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Okay okay theek theek theek. Aap ek kaam kijiye. Ye unse ye bol dijiyega ke timing kya hai duty ki? Hmm hmm.
Executive: Hmm sir ye to 9 to 6.
Customer: 9 to 6 hai? Abhi fix to nahi hua hai maine abhi abhi call kiya hai inko back. Abhi jaise inka call aaya tha to meeting mein tha. To uske baad mein jaise free hua maine kuch product abhi check kare. Maine apne employee ko bola tha aur maine apne se aap usme dono log milke kar lo. Kuch product nahi aaye unhe samajh mein. Maine back call kiya. Maine apne employee ko bhi bola line pe lo unhone bhi call lagaya to unki taraf se nahi uthaya. Maine lagaya mera receive nahi kiya tab jaake maine apne number se laga ke aapko call kiya abhi. To ya to unko ye bolo ke abhi mere ko connect kar le kyuki mere ko bhi office wapis jana hai abhi. Matlab aap samajh rahe ho?
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Main aapko 20 minute ya 30 minute de dunga. Kuch critical jo hote hai na thoda sa hote hai product. Wo main bata deta hu. Uske baad main bhi niklu. Join kar lo. Karte nahi kya? Aap join kar lo. Rest main bhi join kar leta hu sir usi time pe. Thoda sa main bhi samajhna chahunga sir aapka product kya hai. Kyuki mujhe to pata hai sir aap palm tree wagera mein deal kar rahe ho sir to mujhe malum hai sir ye kya hai product. Theek hai nursery mein aap kaam kar rahe ho sir to us hisab ka aapko flow chahiye. 50 ped 100 ped mein aap deal waise bhi nahi karoge. Theek hai?
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Haan ye aapki. Mujhe haan mujhe malum hai sir mere paas aise kam se kam saat se aath customer honge. Mere sabse bada base Saharanpur padta hai sir. Right?
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Isi sir isi tarah se to chahiye matlab aap samajh rahe ho na? Ki aap unko matlab thoda kuch apne hath se bhi kar lo yaar mere taraf se hi. Agar aap Deepanshi ko bolo koi issue wagera aa raha hai to Deepanshi ko agar nahi aayega to wo mere se baat karegi. Itni call kiya agar main aapko uska resolution dunga. Maine isliye call kiya abhi aap jaise main bata raha hu jaise ek manager ke paas sir kam se.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Bas 150 se 200 mein suppliers hote hai. Theek hai aapke jaise hi. To for sure sir agar wo kisi ke sath engaged hongi to mushkil hai sir ki aapka phone. Nahi to revert to karenge hi karenge for sure. Done sir. To main abhi unko connect karata hu sir wo free hai abhi. Theek hai to ek meeting mein hai actually mein wo. Main unko just unka meeting khatam hota hai main aapse bolta hu aapko phone lagayengi wo. To is bar unse bhi sir aap video meet kar lena Google Meet pe. Theek hai? To ho sakta hai main personally main bhi join kar lunga usme. Sir problem ek hai na ab aap meri condition samjho ab main abhi jaha khada hu ek side pe khada hu main kam chal raha hai mere logo ko. Koi issue nahi hai sir aap call pe bata do dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Haan yahi main kehna chah raha hu mere call se samajh lo na. Mere mere ko mind mein fit hai mujhe pata hai kya product hai mere. Mujhe to pata hai na. Kya hai na sir dekho jaise main maine aap maan lo supplier ho sir jaise mujhe itni knowledge is wajah se hai kyuki maine 50 suppliers se video meeting kiya hua hai sir. Aur unka har bar Maurya ji likhte hai wo kaun se wale Maurya ho aap?
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Kaun se wale Maurya? Sir ye kaun se wale Maurya to mujhe nahi pata sir bas Maurya likhta hu. Are main bata raha hu main bata raha hu.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Are wo nahi keh raha hu main bura nahi manna main puch raha hu. Dekhiye main aise hota na jaise hum Kushwaha mein bhi Maurya hote hai kuch log aise likhte hai kuch aap Kushwaha aise na to hamare yaha pe jo Kushwaha Maurya wo kariban hum log ko maan lo ki usme Kushwaha bhi likhte hai. Theek hai to hum log Maurya bhi hai Kushwaha bhi likhte hai. Main samajh gaya to aapko ye sab cheeze aati hongi samajh mein fountain product ye sab aata hai samajh mein ped paudhe ye sab samajh mein aate honge. Ye hamara samajh lijiye ki wo kheti kisani wala kaam to wahi hai aap samajh jayiye utna background hi wahi hai. Haan to wo wahi main keh raha hu sir aapke samajh mein aa gaya hoga bas isliye samajh mein aa gaya hoga mere ko. Aapke jaise ek palm tree ka sir price 200 mein bhi aata hai ek palm tree sir 700 mein bhi aata hai depend karta hai uske mitti ka. Kya baat hai bas bas bas bas bas yahi aap yahi chahiye tha mujhe yaar. To aise manager kuch matlab theek hai main badhiya hai aap bhi mere se join main to keh raha hu mera aur additional karwa do package wagera kuch mujhe aur kar do ek aur manager. Result milna chahiye na samne se kya fark padta hai. Wahi keh raha hu sir. Ek cheez mujhe bataye sir aap main aapko Deepanshi ko meeting mein connect karta hu sir baat karata hu aapse theek hai. Baki sir na aapne ye 96 pe call kiya hua na to system khul jata hai theek hai IndiaMART pe. Haan. To wo concern bhi main aapko attend nahi ho raha tha. Haan koi baat nahi sir. Maine isko janti se bulaya ki bhai samne wala call nahi liya to main fir kya uske samne wale ka intzar thodi karunga yaha khade ho gaye sadak pe ki bhai main unko call laga lu ab wo pata nahi kab call mein free honge tab mere ko back karenge. Samajh gaya main samajh gaya samajh gaya samajh gaya. Koi nahi sir main aapko unse connect karata hu. Free ho jaye wo kar le. Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Products listing not showing properly.

- Calling is less, wants to know the reason.

- Wants Sparshi Verma as account manager.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed the average calls received.

- Executive explained the factors affecting call ratio.

- Executive will connect with Deepanshi after meeting.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect with Deepanshi.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- listing, account manager, calls, products
